message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique and valuable. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's exceptional quality and rarity.
I'm interested in the product, but $900000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $750000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $750000 is a significant amount, but I'm not willing to compromise on the value of this exceptional product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $825000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's unique features and the effort that went into creating it.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, $825000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $775000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products and the value I would get from owning this unique item.
